changelog.md.S'il n'y a pas d'information sur la mise: If there is no information on the update, it means that it concerns only the update of documentation, translation or text

index.md.va vous permettre de piloter vos velux d: will allow you to control your skylights in Jeedom via the VELUX KLF 200 interface and to control their position, raising or lowering, and stopping
index.md.Les velux doivent prélablement être appa: The skylights must first be paired with the VELUX KLF 200 interface and it must be connected in ethernet on the same local network as Jeedom
index.md.Comme tout plugin Jeedom, le plugin: Like any Jeedom plugin, the plugin
index.md.Si ce n'était pas déjà le cas, ces 2 plu: If it was not already the case, these 2 plugins will be installed during the installation of the dependencies
index.md.L'installation des dépendances est sucep: The installation of dependencies is likely to take several minutes depending on the configurations
index.md.Un broker MQTT doit être configuré et ac: An MQTT broker must be configured and active in the plugin
index.md.afin de transmettre et récupérer les pos: in order to transmit and retrieve the positions of the skylights
index.md.Référez-vous à la documentation du plugi: Refer to the plugin documentation to use an existing broker or to create one locally in Jeedom
index.md.Dès que le démon du plugin: As soon as the plugin daemon
index.md.sera en mesure de récupérer automatiquem: will be able to automatically retrieve MQTT broker connection information
index.md.La configuration du plugin consiste à re: The configuration of the plugin consists of filling in the connection information to the VELUX KLF 200 interface
index.md.L'adresse ip du KLF200 sur le réseau loc: The KLF200 ip address on the local network
index.md.Une fois les informations de connexion à: Once the connection information for the VELUX KLF 200 interface has been entered and saved, click on the button
index.md.pour vérifier que tout est en ordre et p: to check that everything is in order and proceed with the creation of the container
index.md.A l'issue de la procédure, les statuts d: At the end of the procedure, the statutes of the docker
index.md.doivent être affichés en vert avec les m: must be displayed in green with the words
index.md.Dans le cas contraire, vérifiez les logs: If not, check the device logs
index.md.Plugins → Protocole domotique → Velux MQ: Plugins → Home automation protocol → Velux MQTT
index.md.Pour accéder aux différents équipements: To access the various Velux equipment, go to the menu
index.md.permet de créer automatiquement les équi: automatically creates the equipment corresponding to the skylights listed on the KLF 200 interface in Jeedom
index.md.Par défaut, l'interface KLF 200 fournit: By default, the KLF 200 interface provides a closing percentage
index.md.que le plugin transforme en pourcentage: that the plugin transforms into open percentage
index.md.Si vous voulez revenir au fonctionnement: If you want to return to default operation, just uncheck the box
